title: On an Edge of Glass
description: You can’t plan for everything…That’s what Ellie Glass realizes after she has a chance encounter with a young musician. Long-haired, a bit scruffy, and undeniably sexy, he’s the exact opposite of her “type,” but now Ellie can’t stop thinking about him. When fate intervenes and the two are thrown together, Ellie gets more than she bargained for. Pretty soon she finds herself feeling and doing things that she never thought were possible. This is the captivating story of an undeniable attraction, the choices that we make, and ultimately, the unexpected power of love.
author: Autumn Doughton
